What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I don't really think I got a lot of new skills from this course. Instead, I would say this course gave me a good foundation for learning a new language.
A better grasp of the French language
I learned more vocabulary from the French in Action series and basic French grammar.

I think the teacher did a very good job of addressing student confusion and was overall very clear about grammar and vocabulary. I think the teacher could have done better in encouraging participation as opposed to just waiting for people to speak. I think because it is a new language many people are embarrassed to speak so it would be more beneficial to foster a comfortable and safe environment.
The course could be improved by having exams every other week instead of every week; I feel like material was often rushed and more review of vocabulary and grammar concepts would be beneficial.
One strength of this course is its rigour. Unfortunately I did not find much of the content relevant to my interests. In addition the content was so much that it was difficult digest appropriately
I would recommend this course but just be prepared to venture outside your comfortability zone.
I would recommend this course to someone who really wants to learn the French language but not someone who wants an easy language for the language credit.
